legacy.full_text: 白露 White Dew。 古人以四时配五行，秋属金，金色白，以白形容秋露，故名“白露”。“露凝而白，气始寒也”，自白露始，天气由热转凉，昼夜温差渐渐拉大，暑热与秋凉就此分界。 https://t.co/CAt5L0zNnZ

legacy.description: Official twitter account of Consulate General of China in Sao Paulo. Aqui será uma plataforma para todos conhecerem melhor a China e as relações China-Brasil!
legacy.name: Consulado-Geral da China em São Paulo

result.text:
The dynamic development of the #BRICS mechanism is an expansion of the platform for South-South cooperation, a boost to the force for peace and justice and another important milestone in the solidarity and cooperation among developing countries, which has been welcomed by most countries.
Together with our #BRICS partners, we will continue to deepen the #BRICS strategic partnership, expand the BRICS Plus cooperation model, enrich the cooperation architecture featuring 3 main drivers, namely, economic cooperation, political and security cooperation, and ppl-to-ppl exchanges, and continue to open new chapters of solidarity and cooperation for development among emerging markets and developing countries, so as to contribute to the building of a community with a shared future for mankind. Source: MFA China.

legacy.full_text: RT @CGChinaSP: This year marks the 10th anniversary of the Belt and Road Initiative proposed by President #Xi Jinping. President Xi has ann…

legacy.description: Official twitter account of Consulate General of China in Sao Paulo. Aqui será uma plataforma para todos conhecerem melhor a China e as relações China-Brasil!
legacy.name: Consulado-Geral da China em São Paulo

result.text:
This year marks the 10th anniversary of the Belt and Road Initiative proposed by President #Xi Jinping. President Xi has announced that China will hold the third Belt and Road Forum for International Cooperation later this year. Over the past decade, the #BRI’s circle of friends has continued to expand. #China has signed #B&R cooperation documents with more than 150 countries and over 30 international organizations. The vision of high-quality B&R cooperation supported by the spirit of extensive consultation, joint contribution and shared benefits, open, green and clean cooperation, and a high-standard, people-centered and sustainable approach has been incorporated in the Joint Communique of the Leaders’ Roundtable of the 2nd #B&R Forum for International Cooperation. 
Over the past decade, #B&R cooperation has achieved fruitful outcomes. It has established more than 3,000 cooperation projects and galvanized nearly USD 1 trillion of investment, creating an array of national landmarks, livelihood projects, and milestones of cooperation. A large number of transport infrastructure projects have been launched, greatly boosting the development of BRI partners. Clean, efficient and quality green energy projects have lit up the road to future development of partner countries. Projects closely linked to people’s daily life and aimed at improving people’s wellbeing in areas of poverty reduction, agricultural technology and vocational education have effectively increased the living standards of people in BRI partner countries. According to the World Bank, by 2030, BRI transport infrastructure, if fully implemented, is expected to increase global real income by 0.7 to 2.9 percent, lifting 7.6 million people from extreme poverty and 32 million people from moderate poverty. Source: MFA China.

legacy.full_text: Burundian President debunks the "China's neo-colonialism in Africa" fallacy. https://t.co/cZzGPAtU9V

Very well said, "Behaviors of others cannot build our family." Whatever others might say, stay on one's own right course and make lives better for oneself and all others. That's how a better world for everybody will come about, not the other way around.
